data.title: Tempur-Pedic Mattresses at Abt
data.description: Shop our entire line of Tempur-Pedic Mattresses at Abt today.

data.title: Tempur-Pedic® Presents: Candy
data.description:
You’ve heard Tempur-Pedic is better. But do you know why? One-of-a-kind Tempur material precisely adapts to your unique body shape. It means personalized comfort and support. Think about it this way: Tempur material is a lot like settling your hand into a container of sprinkles...densely packed in together, responsive and adaptive. Ordinary memory foam and innerspring mattresses are more like gumballs…not nearly as responsive or adaptive. 

Sorry, gumballs.  There’s simply nothing like a Tempur-Pedic — truly personalized comfort for life-changing sleep.

data.title: Tempur-Pedic® Presents: Impressions
data.description:
You’ve heard Tempur-Pedic is better. But do you know why? One-of-a-kind Tempur material precisely adapts to any shape, while reducing pressure points. So we set out to show just how Tempur material conforms to every nook and cranny by making some “impressions.” Originally developed by NASA for cushioning and support during takeoff, we perfected Tempur material for sleepers, adapting to your shape, weight and temperature. It becomes soft where you want it, and firm where you need it. Ordinary memory foam mattresses just don’t adapt or relieve pressure in the same way.  

There’s simply nothing like a Tempur-Pedic — deeper pressure relief for life-changing sleep.

data.title: Tempur-Pedic® Presents: Slow Melt
data.description:
You’ve heard Tempur-Pedic is better. But do you know why? One-of-a-kind Tempur material provides personalized comfort and support, adapting to your weight, shape and temperature. So we set out to prove it…with people in spandex, showing the “slow melt” feeling you get on a Tempur-Pedic. Every part of your body gets a little hug. You won’t find that with ordinary memory foam or innerspring mattresses. 

There’s simply nothing like a Tempur-Pedic — truly personalized comfort for life-changing sleep.

data.title: Tempur-Pedic® Presents: Still As Can Be
data.description:
You’ve heard Tempur-Pedic is better. But do you know why? …If you’re familiar with the iconic wine glass test, you know that it’s proof that Tempur-Pedic is in a class of its own in reducing motion transfer. It means you sleep still and undisturbed through the night. So we set out to prove it once again…with dancers, yoga, backflips, sledgehammers and kids who just had a lot of sugar. As always, the wine glass remains still as can be. Ordinary memory foam and spring mattresses just don’t compare. 

There’s simply nothing like a Tempur-Pedic — reduced motion transfer for undisturbed, life-changing sleep.
